channel.title: GFX off?
channel.description: Does anyone know what needs to be edited to get toggable gfx

item.title: GFX off?
item.dc:creator: @pplsuqbawlz pplsuqbawlz
item.description:
@pplsuqbawlz wrote:

Turning graphical interfaces off cause the client to cease rendering. The client constantly sends in del-times and cyclic rates to assure that you are indeed playing with graphics. As far as turning these off, I reccomend you DON’T unless you have every idea about what you’re doing. And no offense, no one here with the possible exception(s) of myself and krichevskoy.

Read full topic

item.title: GFX off?
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

[quote=“Krichevskoy, post:2, topic:692”]For RSC, there are several ways to do it. Mostly, the game doesn’t need to actaully paint the images in order to maintain the world.

For RS2, don’t even think about it. How could a human possibly be playing the game with a blank screen?[/quote]

aryan does it, take out the trp that reports you or some shit

Read full topic

item.title: GFX off?

item.description:

For RSC, there are several ways to do it. Mostly, the game doesn’t need to actaully paint the images in order to maintain the world.

For RS2, don’t even think about it. How could a human possibly be playing the game with a blank screen?
